#include <iostream>
#include <string>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
    int testcases;
    int length = 0;
    int sum = 0;
    string str;
    cin >> testcases;
    for(int x = 0; x < testcases; x++)
        {
            cin >> str;
            length = str.length();
            if(length > 2)
            {
                for(int x = 0; x < length; x++)
                {
                    sum = sum + int(str[x]);
                }
                sum = sum / length;
                cout << char(sum) << endl;
                sum = 0;
            }
        }


    return 0;
}
